sentences.en: “Whatever thoughts he may have entertained about mending some fences with&I{[them]}  were banished” (&b{Conor Cruise O'Brien})
sentences.cn: “不管他曾有过什么&I{与他们} 改善关系的想法，这些想法都被排除了” (&b{康纳·克鲁斯·奥布赖恩})

sentences.en: Could you mend my bike for me?
sentences.cn: 你能帮我修一下自行车吗？

sentences.en: He was anxious to mend the rift between the two men.
sentences.cn: 他急于弥合这两个人之间的裂痕.

sentences.en: His leg isn’t mending as quickly as he’d expected.
sentences.cn: 他的腿愈合得不像他预想的那样快。

sentences.en: I felt that might well mend the rift between them.
sentences.cn: 我觉得那样做也许可以让他们冰释前嫌。

sentences.en: If he doesn’t mend his ways, he’ll be asked to leave.
sentences.cn: 如果他不好好改改，会让他走人的。

sentences.en: is it too late to mend fences with your ex-wife?.
sentences.cn: 现在与你前妻重归于好太晚了吗？。

sentences.en: Look here, you two , you're always at loggerheads. Mend it or end it.
sentences.cn: 喂, 你们俩老是争吵. 要么握手言和,要么决裂算了.

sentences.en: My father used to mend our shoes.
sentences.cn: 我父亲过去常为我们修补鞋子。

sentences.en: Relations between Japan and China have recently been on the mend.
sentences.cn: 最近,中日关系在向好的方面发展.

sentences.en: She asked how to mend the radio.
sentences.cn: 她问无线电怎么修.

sentences.en: Somebody helped me mend the puncture.
sentences.cn: 有个人帮我修补扎破的轮胎。

sentences.en: The youths are taught how to spray paint cars and mend fences.
sentences.cn: 教授年轻人如何给汽车喷漆和修理护栏。

sentences.en: They requested sappers to mend bridges or remove mines.
sentences.cn: 他们要求坑道工兵修桥或拆雷。

sentences.en: They started to mend the woodwork and paint the walls.
sentences.cn: 他们开始修补木建部分，粉刷墙壁。

sentences.en: Tim can mend any broken toy.
sentences.cn: 什么玩具坏了蒂姆都能修。

sentences.en: We need an electrician to mend the iron.
sentences.cn: 我们要请电工修理熨斗.

sentences.en: When are you going to mend that light in the hall?
sentences.cn: 你打算什么时候修一修门厅里的那盏灯？

sentences.en: Will you please mend the sleeve of my blouse?
sentences.cn: 请你把我衬衣的袖子补一下好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You should mend your manners.
sentences.cn: 你的态度应当纠正.

sentences.en: You'll mend. The X-rays show that your arm will heal all right.
sentences.cn: 你会康复的。X光照片显示你的胳膊能够较好地复原。

sentences.en: You'll need a strong adhesive to mend that chair.
sentences.cn: 你需要一种粘性很强的东西来修理那把椅子.

words.tran_cn: 修理,修补,缝补,增强,医治

phrases.tran_cn: 改善关系：改善不良关系，尤指在政治中
修补篱笆；争取重新建立好关系

trans.tran_en: to be getting better after an illness or after a difficult period

trans.tran_cn: 修理，缝补，康复，解决争端
trans.tran_en: to repair a tear or hole in a piece of clothing
